name: Get Puck'd
description:
Get Puck’d is a competitive couch multiplayer deathmatch set on ice. The player must pick up different weapons and power ups, whilst avoiding hazards and attempting to be the last man standing.

Version 0.4 has 3 levels, 4 playable characters, 5 power ups and 5 weapons.

This game requires gamepads to be played.

If you have any feedback or encounter any bugs, please use the feedback section on the main menu of the game.

NOTE: THIS GAME IS A WORK-IN-PROGRESS. BUGS SHOULD BE EXPECTED.
